entry.title: markdown使用教程
entry.content: R MarkdownThis is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. 学习过程中收集的网络资源在学习markdown过程中收集了很多网络资源，有王诗翔的简书,https://www.jianshu.com/p/a592caee9774markdown基本语法https://www.jianshu.com/p/191d1e21f7edW3Cschool网站上有很多资源https://www.w3cschool.cn/markdownyfsm/Markdown Here Cheatsheethttps://github.com/adam-p/markdown-here/wiki/Markdown-Here-Cheatsheet感谢前辈的经验分享，使得后来者能少走很多弯路。

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
